theVampire:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theVampire:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theVampire:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theVampire:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theVampire:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theVampire:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theVampire:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theVampire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theVampire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theVampire:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theVampire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theVampire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theVampire:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theVampire:Devour.NAME: Devour
theVampire:Devour.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Enemy loses 2 Strength. Exhaust
theVampire:Devour.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Enemy loses 2 Strength, Gain 2 Strength. NL Exhaust.

theVampire:Temptation.NAME: Temptation
theVampire:Temptation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. thevampire:Feast !M! : gain !M! Strength and !M! Blood.

theVampire:Reserve.NAME: Reserve
theVampire:Reserve.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the encounter, ignore !M! thevampire:Thirst.

theVampire:Anticipation.NAME: Anticipation
theVampire:Anticipation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw Blood, heal 1 HP.

theVampire:CrimsonShield.NAME: Crimson Shield
theVampire:CrimsonShield.DESCRIPTION: Converts the next damage you are dealt into thevampire:Thirst.
theVampire:CrimsonShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Converts the next damage you are dealt into thevampire:Thirst.

theVampire:CursedFumes.NAME: Cursed Fumes
theVampire:CursedFumes.DESCRIPTION: Apply Vulnerable equal to your thevampire:Thirst to all ennemies.

theVampire:GiveIn.NAME: Give In
theVampire:GiveIn.DESCRIPTION: thevampire:Feast 50% of your thevampire:Thirst. Deal that much damage.
theVampire:GiveIn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thevampire:Feast 75% of your thevampire:Thirst. Deal that much damage.

theVampire:OpenWound.NAME: Open Wound
theVampire:OpenWound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When you attack the creature this turn, gain 1 thevampire:Thirst.

theVampire:BloodTax.NAME: Blood Tax
theVampire:BloodTax.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to each enemy, then add 1 thevampire:Blood to your draw pile for each enemy hit.

theVampire:Repent.NAME: Repent
theVampire:Repent.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all thevampire:Blood in your draw pile. Heal 1 HP for each thevampire:Blood exhausted. NL Exhaust.
theVampire:Repent.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all thevampire:Blood in your draw pile. Heal 1 HP for each thevampire:Blood exhausted.

theVampire:RedMist.NAME: Red Mist
theVampire:RedMist.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! thevampire:Blood in your draw pile. Gain 1 Intangible for each thevampire:Blood exhausted. NL Exhaust.

theVampire:VampireForm.NAME: ??? Form
theVampire:VampireForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play thevampire:Blood, steal !M! HP to each enemy. NL Ethereal.
theVampire:VampireForm.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust thevampire:Blood, steal !M! HP to each enemy. NL Ethereal.

theVampire:BasicBlock.NAME: BasicBlock (TO RENAME)
theVampire:BasicBlock.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 thevampire:Blood from your draw pile to gain !B! block.

theVampire:BasicAttack.NAME: BasicAttack (TO RENAME)
theVampire:BasicAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 thevampire:Blood to your draw pile.

theVampire:Satiated.NAME: Satiated
theVampire:Satiated.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each thevampire:Blood in your hand.
